item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: semona
item.content:encoded:
Your Name (required)
[text* your-name]

Your Email (required)
[email* your-email]

Subject
[text your-subject]

Your Message
[textarea your-message]

[submit "Send"]

[your-subject] [your-name] From: [your-name] Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Simple Blog (http://demo.theme-paradise.com/semona/simple-blog) theme.paradise14@gmail.com Reply-To: [your-email] 0 0 [your-subject] Simple Blog Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Simple Blog (http://demo.theme-paradise.com/semona/simple-blog) [your-email] Reply-To: theme.paradise14@gmail.com 0 0 Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill in the required field. This input is too long. This input is too short.

item.title: Semona Contact Form
item.dc:creator: semona
item.content:encoded:
<label class="sm-with-icon icon-name">[text* name placeholder "Your Name"]</label> <label class="sm-with-icon icon-email">[email* email placeholder "Email Address..."]</label> <label class="sm-with-icon icon-message">[textarea message placeholder "Your Message..."]</label> [submit "Send"] [your-subject] [your-name] From: [your-name] Subject: [your-subject]
Message Body: [your-message]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Blogs Demo (http://demo.theme-paradise.com/semona/blogs-demo) theme.paradise14@gmail.com Reply-To: [your-email]
[your-subject] Blogs Demo Message Body: [your-message]
